    • Method Detail

      • booking

        public void booking​(java.lang.String name,
                    char book,
                    int num)
        This method will be used to change fullness of room by guest and receptionist
        Parameters:
        name - is guest name
        book - is situation if room is empty, reserved, booked
        num - is number of person stays in the room

      • delete

        public void delete​()
        This method will be used to clear out the room

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName​()
        Returns:
        guest's name who responsible for the room

      • getBooked

        public char getBooked​()
        Returns:
        B, if the room is booked; R, if it is made reservation or E, if it is empty

      • getPersonNum

        public int getPersonNum​()
        Returns:
        number of person stays in the room

      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String val)
        Parameters:
        val - is empty if the room is empty. If room is not empty, val is the guest's name.

      • setBooked

        public void setBooked​(char val)
        Room condition
        Parameters:
        val - E means empty; B, booked; R, reserved

      • setPerson

        public void setPerson​(int n)
        Person number must be 1 or 2. It is bed number in room
        Parameters:
        n - value is number of person -in the room-

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        obj - should be Room which is checked. All member should be same.
        Returns:
